name: Malireddy Babi and Ratnakanya Memorial Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Malireddy Charitable Trust (MCT), a social initiative in a wider context, represents both rural and urban populace of Coastal Andhra Pradesh. The not-for-profit organization strives to bring social awareness amongst the masses on food and nutrition, health and sanitation, women and child welfare, environment and sustainable livelihoods, and disaster management. Instituted in 2007, MCT promotes information dissemination through content generation, education, research, training and Support. Community-based audio-visual media, programming, and Support are provided to address a range of requirements in the society.
